test_cases.Title: DocumentiCollegati_001_Documentazione_Visualizzazione_TEST_Desktop_Visualizzazione della tabella dei documenti collegati

Steps.Step Description: Accedere alla sezione 'Documenti collegati' nel sistema.
Steps.Expected Result: La sezione 'Documenti collegati' viene visualizzata correttamente.

Steps.Step Description: Controllare la presenza della tabella con i documenti collegati.
Steps.Expected Result: La tabella dei documenti collegati è visibile e presenta le intestazioni appropriate.

Steps.Step Description: Verificare che il documento con titolo 'RU Sportsbook Platform - Anagrafica e Gestione Eventi Brand Spagna' sia presente.
Steps.Expected Result: Il documento è elencato nella tabella con il titolo corretto.

Steps.Step Description: Controllare che la versione e la data del documento siano correttamente visualizzate.
Steps.Expected Result: La versione '3.0' e la data del documento sono visualizzate correttamente nel formato previsto.

test_cases.Preconditions: L'utente deve essere autenticato e autorizzato ad accedere alla sezione 'Documenti collegati'.
test_cases.Expected Result: La tabella dei documenti collegati è visualizzata correttamente e include le informazioni corrette.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Coprire solo la visualizzazione e la presenza dei documenti, non il download o l'editing.

test_cases.Title: DocumentiCollegati_002_Documentazione_CorrettezzaInformazioni_TEST_Desktop_Verifica delle informazioni dei documenti collegati

Steps.Expected Result: La sezione 'Documenti collegati' viene visualizzata senza errori.

Steps.Step Description: Verificare che il documento compaia con le informazioni di titolo corrette.
Steps.Expected Result: Il documento 'RU Sportsbook Platform - Anagrafica e Gestione Eventi Brand Spagna' è visualizzato con il titolo esatto.

Steps.Step Description: Controllare la versione del documento.
Steps.Expected Result: La versione visualizzata è '3.0'.

Steps.Step Description: Controllare la data del documento.
Steps.Expected Result: La data visualizzata è valida e correllata con la versione del documento.

test_cases.Preconditions: L'utente deve essere autenticato.
test_cases.Expected Result: Le informazioni del documento sono visualizzate e corrette in tutti gli aspetti.

test_cases.Title: Brand_001_Requirement_BrandSpain_Implementation_TEST_Desktop_Validate the introduction of Brand Spain

Steps.Step Description: Access the Anagrafica platform.
Steps.Expected Result: The Anagrafica platform is successfully opened.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section where brands can be added.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is redirected to the brand management section.

Steps.Step Description: Select the option to add a new brand.
Steps.Expected Result: The new brand creation form is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Input 'Brand Spain' as the brand name and fill in other mandatory fields.
Steps.Expected Result: The input fields accept the values without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the brand creation form.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating that Brand Spain has been successfully added.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have administrative access to the Anagrafica platform.
test_cases.Dataset: Brand name: 'Brand Spain', other mandatory fields filled appropriately.
test_cases.Expected Result: Brand Spain is successfully added to the Anagrafica platform.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the addition of Brand Spain; does not include brand deletion or updates.

test_cases.Title: View_Sport_001_Brand_Spagna_TEST_Desktop_Viewing Sports entities

Steps.Step Description: Login to the Anagrafica, Configurazione e Gestione Eventi application.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and taken to the home page.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Sport' section of the Brand Spain module.
Steps.Expected Result: The Sport section is displayed with a list of sports entities from the Spanish regulator.

Steps.Step Description: Select a sports entity to view its details.
Steps.Expected Result: The details of the selected sports entity are displayed correctly.

test_cases.Preconditions: The user has proper access rights to the application and is connected to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can successfully view sports entities.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only viewing functionality; editing or deleting sports entities are not included.

test_cases.Title: Associate_Sport_002_Brand_Spagna_TEST_Desktop_Associating Sports entities

Steps.Step Description: Login to the Anagrafica, Configurazione e Gestione Eventi application.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Sport' section of the Brand Spain module.
Steps.Expected Result: The Sport section is presented.

Steps.Step Description: Select a sports entity and initiate the 'Associate' action.
Steps.Expected Result: The association interface is displayed for selecting Brand Master entities.

Steps.Step Description: Select one or more Brand Master entities to associate with the selected sports entity.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected Brand Master entities are marked for association.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm the association.
Steps.Expected Result: The system reflects updated associations without errors.

test_cases.Preconditions: The user has sufficient permissions to perform associations.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user credentials, available Brand Master entities
test_cases.Expected Result: The sports entity is successfully associated with the selected Brand Master entities.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers association functionality only; error handling not included.

test_cases.Title: Complete_Manifestations_003_Brand_Spagna_TEST_Desktop_Completing manifestations

Steps.Step Description: Login to the Anagrafica, Configurazione e Gestione Eventi application.
Steps.Expected Result: User logs into the system.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Manifestazioni' section of the Brand Spain module.
Steps.Expected Result: The Manifestazioni section is displayed with available Brand Master manifestations.

Steps.Step Description: Select a manifestation to edit.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected manifestation details are displayed for editing.

Steps.Step Description: Complete the missing required fields as specified by the Spanish regulator.
Steps.Expected Result: All mandatory fields are filled correctly without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Save the completed manifestation.
Steps.Expected Result: The manifestation is saved successfully and reflects the updated details.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the Manifestazioni section.
test_cases.Dataset: User credentials, existing manifestations requiring data completion
test_cases.Expected Result: Manifestation is successfully completed and saved.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the completion of manifestations only; visibility or validation features not included.

test_cases.Title: Publish_Events_004_Brand_Spagna_TEST_Desktop_Publishing events

Steps.Step Description: Login to the Anagrafica, Configurazione e Gestione Eventi application.
Steps.Expected Result: User successfully logs in.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Avvenimenti' section of the Brand Spain module.
Steps.Expected Result: The Avvenimenti section displays a list of events.

Steps.Step Description: Select an event that is not published.
Steps.Expected Result: Details of the selected event are displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Publish' button to publish the event.
Steps.Expected Result: The event publishing process begins without any errors.

Steps.Step Description: Check the status of the event post-publishing.
Steps.Expected Result: The event is marked as published successfully.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has proper permissions to publish events.
test_cases.Dataset: Active user credentials, existing unpublished events
test_cases.Expected Result: The event is successfully published.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers event publishing; event unpublishing or error management not included.

test_cases.Title: Brand_Module_Limitations_Assumptions_TEST_Web_performance of the new Brand module in the application

Steps.Step Description: Access the Brand module in the application.

Steps.Expected Result: Comparative data is shown correctly, highlighting differences.

test_cases.Title: Brand_Module_Comparison_Test_Limitations_FUNCTIONAL_Web_verifying filter operation for different regions

Steps.Expected Result: The search returns correct results according to the filters applied.

Steps.Expected Result: Results are consistent or display differences if applicable.

test_cases.Title: Modify_International_Flag_001_Manifestation_Application_TEST_Desktop_User_Modifies_International_Flag

Steps.Step Description: Log into the application as an authenticated user.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the application's dashboard.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Manifestations' section under the Brand Spain.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Manifestations' section is displayed with available search options.

Steps.Expected Result: The system displays search results for the manifestations based on the search query.

Steps.Step Description: Identify the specific manifestation to modify with the 'Category' field.

Steps.Step Description: Check if the 'Internazionale' field is set to 'No'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Internazionale' field displays 'No'.

Steps.Step Description: Select the value 'Si' from the dropdown list for the 'Internazionale' field.
Steps.Expected Result: The selection is made, and the application acknowledges the change.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm the modification by clicking the 'Conferma' button.
Steps.Expected Result: A popup confirmation is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Click 'Conferma' to proceed with the update.
Steps.Expected Result: The system shows a success message indicating the operation was successful.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the 'Sigla ISO' field is set to '00' and is disabled.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Sigla ISO' field displays '00' and is no longer editable.

test_cases.Expected Result: The 'Internazionale' field is successfully updated to 'Si' and the 'Sigla ISO' is set to '00'.
test_cases._polarion: Percorso base – Manifestazione su cui il campo 'Internazionale' risulta impostato a 'No'
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the change of the 'Internazionale' field; other fields are not verified.

test_cases.Title: International_Field_Set_To_Yes_TEST_Web_Confirming_the_modification_of_the_International_field

Steps.Step Description: Select 'No' from the dropdown list for the 'Internazionale' field.
Steps.Expected Result: The dropdown updates to display 'No' as selected.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the popup confirmation for the change.

Steps.Step Description: Select a value for the 'Sigla ISO' field.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged in and the form containing the 'Internazionale' and 'Sigla ISO' fields is open.

test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully changes the 'Internazionale' field and edits the 'Sigla ISO' field as expected.
test_cases._polarion: Percorso alternativo – Manifestazione su cui il campo 'Internazionale' risulta impostato a 'Si'

test_cases.Title: association_single_001_USECASE_Associazione_BM_DGOJ_TEST_Mobile_IOS_selection_of_sport_BM_and_association_with_DGOJ

Steps.Step Description: Press the 'Confirm' button to proceed with the association.

Steps.Step Description: Check the navigation tree for updates reflecting the new association.
Steps.Expected Result: The navigation tree shows the updated status for the BM sport.
